list: By 2030, Apple intends to “become carbon neutral across its global footprint by using more recycled materials, renewable electricity and lower‑carbon transportation.” (this applies to AirTag)
Apple wants to innovate for all and use business as a force for good (this applies to AirTag)
Apple wants to design products that are accessible i.e. everyone regardless of their abilities can use an Apple product with ease (this applies to AirTag)
Apple believes that privacy is a fundamental human right and designs products that protect it. (this applies to AirTag)
